events.body: ACK. With or without my nits, your call.
One little nit, but other than that, ACK

+Bitcoin Core now uses 'headers-first synchronization'. This means that we first
+ask peers for block headers (a total of 27 megabytes, in december 2014) and
comments.body: Perhaps change "in" to "as of"? The current phrasing seems a bit odd to me. Also, I think month names are proper nouns?
